text: Hey, y'all!
Jon Reep here -- "The Well Readneck."
I was gonna read this here [Straining] "Infinite Jest" book
till I realized it's 1,000 pages too long.
So, instead, I figured I'd switch to my favorite franchise,
[British accent] "Harry Potter."
[ Normal voice ] You know,
J.K. Rowling didn't write this herself.
Figured she had a ghost writer.
And it takes place 13 years later?
[ Scoffs ]
And look at this.
Jack Thorne has his name on here twice.
I never did understand that song --
"Jimmy crack corn and I don't care."
What is a crack corn?
"Hey. Did you hear what happened to Jimmy?
He's stuck on the crack corn."
Whoo! Oh.
Well, that's it for now.
Thanks for joining us
on another edition of "The Well Readneck."
Till next time...bilingual!
[ Classical music plays ]
